scripts.test: OBJECTIVE_DEV_PREPEND=_ node_modules/.bin/mocha --full-trace --require should --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register test/**/*_spec.* test/*_spec.*
scripts.continuous: OBJECTIVE_DEV_PREPEND=_ node_modules/.bin/mocha --watch --full-trace --require should --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register test/**/*_spec.* test/*_spec.coffee
